00050 class SourceFileWav : public Source {
00051  public:
00052     static SourceRef                    createRef( DataSourceRef dataSourceRef ) { return createFileWavRef( dataSourceRef ); }
00053     static SourceFileWavRef             createFileWavRef( DataSourceRef dataSourceRef );
00054     ~SourceFileWav();
00055 
00056     LoaderRef createLoader( Target *target ) { return LoaderSourceFileWav::createRef( this, target ); }
00057 
00058     uint32_t getLength() const { return mDataLength; };
00059     double getDuration() const { /*TODO*/ return 0.0;  }
00060
